mapper.sql: a.id as user_msg_id, a.username as user_msg_username, a.nickname as user_msg_nickname, a.`password` as `user_msg_password`, a.phone as user_msg_phone, a.email as user_msg_email, a.real_name as user_msg_real_name, a.sex as user_msg_sex, a.profile_photo as user_msg_profile_photo, a.personal_sign as user_msg_personal_sign, a.created_time as user_msg_created_time, a.updated_time as user_msg_updated_time
mapper.select:
select from user_msg a
and a.username like concat(#{username}, '%')
and a.phone like concat(#{phone}, '%')
and a.email like concat(#{email}, '%')
select from user_msg a where a.username like concat(#{username}, '%');
mapper.insert: insert into user_msg (username, nickname, `password`, phone, email, real_name, sex, profile_photo, personal_sign, created_time, updated_time) values (#{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{realName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sex,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{profilePhoto,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{personalSign,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

mapper.update:
update user_msg
username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
nickname = #{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
`password` = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

updated_time = #{updatedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update user_msg set username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, nickname = #{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `password` = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, real_name = #{realName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sex = #{sex,jdbcType=TINYINT}, profile_photo = #{profilePhoto,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, personal_sign = #{personalSign,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, created_time = #{createdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updated_time = #{updatedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
